org.apache.flink.metrics.statsd

类 StatsDReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.metrics.reporter.AbstractReporter
      • org.apache.flink.metrics.statsd.StatsDReporter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CharacterFilter, MetricReporter, Scheduled

    @PublicEvolving
public class StatsDReporter
extends AbstractReporter
implements Scheduled
    Largely based on the StatsDReporter class by ReadyTalk.

    https://github.com/ReadyTalk/metrics-statsd/blob/master/metrics3-statsd/src/main/java/com/readytalk/metrics/StatsDReporter.java

    Ported since it was not present in maven central.

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public void open(MetricConfig config)
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Configures this reporter. Since reporters are instantiated generically and hence parameter-less, this method is the place where the reporters set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated reporter.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        config - A properties object that contains all parameters set for this reporter.

      • close

        public void close()
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Closes this reporter. Should be used to close channels, streams and release resources.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 MetricReporter

      • report

        public void report()
        从接口复制的说明: Scheduled
        Report the current measurements. This method is called periodically by the metrics registry that uses the reporter.
        指定者:
        report 在接口中 Scheduled

      • filterCharacters

        public java.lang.String filterCharacters(java.lang.String input)
        从接口复制的说明: CharacterFilter
        Filter the given string and generate a resulting string from it.

        For example, one implementation could filter out invalid characters from the input string.

        指定者:
        filterCharacters 在接口中 CharacterFilter
        参数:
        input - Input string
        返回:
        Filtered result string
